Questions.Question: What is the name of the artificial intelligence in the movie '2001: A Space Odyssey'?
Questions.Explanation: HAL 9000 is the sentient computer system in '2001: A Space Odyssey' that goes rogue.

Questions.Question: In the 'Star Trek' series, what powers the starships?
Questions.Explanation: Starships in 'Star Trek' are powered by the Warp Drive, allowing faster-than-light travel.

Questions.Question: Which sci-fi movie features the concept of 'bullet time'?
Questions.Explanation: 'The Matrix' popularized the concept of 'bullet time,' where time appears to slow down during action sequences.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the virtual reality world in 'Ready Player One'?
Questions.Explanation: In 'Ready Player One,' OASIS is a virtual reality world where people escape their dystopian reality.

Questions.Question: Which sci-fi series features the concept of 'teleportation'?
Questions.Explanation: In 'Star Trek,' teleportation is a common method of transportation using matter-energy conversion.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the advanced AI in the 'Terminator' franchise?
Questions.Explanation: Skynet is the self-aware AI system that initiates a war against humanity in the 'Terminator' movies.

Questions.Question: Which sci-fi movie features the concept of 'time travel'?
Questions.Explanation: 'Back to the Future' revolves around the adventures of a teenager who travels through time using a DeLorean car.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the AI assistant in the 'Iron Man' movies?
Questions.Explanation: J.A.R.V.I.S. (Just A Rather Very Intelligent System) is Tony Stark's AI assistant in the 'Iron Man' movies.

Questions.Question: Which sci-fi series features the concept of 'cybernetic implants'?
Questions.Explanation: 'Ghost in the Shell' explores a world where humans can enhance their bodies with cybernetic implants.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the supercomputer in 'WarGames'?
Questions.Explanation: WOPR (War Operation Plan Response) is the supercomputer that nearly starts a nuclear war in 'WarGames.'

Questions.Question: Which sci-fi movie features the concept of 'holographic displays'?
Questions.Explanation: 'Minority Report' showcases a future where holographic displays are used for interactive interfaces and data visualization.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the AI in the 'Ex Machina' movie?
Questions.Explanation: Ava is the AI created by a reclusive genius in 'Ex Machina' with a human-like appearance.

Questions.Question: Which sci-fi series features the concept of 'time dilation'?
Questions.Explanation: 'Interstellar' explores the effects of time dilation when astronauts travel near a black hole.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the AI in the 'Her' movie?
Questions.Explanation: Samantha is the AI operating system with a human-like personality in the movie 'Her.'

Questions.Question: Which sci-fi movie features the concept of 'mind uploading'?
FalseAnswer: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
Questions.Explanation: 'Transcendence' explores the idea of transferring a human consciousness into a computer system.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the AI in the 'Blade Runner' series?
Questions.Explanation: In the 'Blade Runner' series, Replicants are bioengineered androids with advanced AI capabilities.

Questions.Question: Which sci-fi series features the concept of 'time manipulation'?
Questions.Explanation: 'Doctor Who' follows the adventures of a time-traveling alien with the ability to manipulate time.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the AI in the 'I, Robot' movie?
Questions.Explanation: V.I.K.I. (Virtual Interactive Kinetic Intelligence) is the central AI system in 'I, Robot' that turns against humans.

Questions.Question: Which sci-fi movie features the concept of 'augmented reality'?
Questions.Explanation: 'The Matrix' depicts a dystopian future where humans perceive a simulated reality as their actual world.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the AI in the 'Avengers' movies?
Questions.Explanation: Ultron is the AI created by Tony Stark in the 'Avengers' movies, which becomes a threat to humanity.
